lines:
1956

139 Forest Ave., 
Jamestown, New York.

March 27, 1010.

S. S. Kivan- at

536 Commonwealtha Amal

Boston

The Registrar,

Phillips Academy, 
Andover, Mass.

Dear Sir:

Can you give me the addresses of S. S. Kwan 
and Chu, P. A. '11? I expect to leave for China 
and Japan in a short time and while there would 
like to meet again some of the men whom I knew 
in school.

Very truly yours,

Carroll Sn. Stall
